fullText: James Ijames's Pulitzer prize-winning play is a brilliant, funny and moving reworking of Hamlet set at a family barbecue in the American south.
dtliExcerpt: James Ijames's Pulitzer prize-winning play is a brilliant, funny and moving reworking of Hamlet set at a family barbecue in the American south.
bwwExcerpt: That “Fat Ham” achieves its happy, even joyful, ending honestly, without denying the weight of forces that make “Hamlet” feel just as honest, is a sign of how capacious and original the writing is, growing the skin of its own necessity instead of merely burrowing into Shakespeare’s. It’s also a sign...
